name: Agile Snake
description:
Agile Snake is a game inspired by other Snake-like games, like the one you could find on the old Nokia phone. The catch is that it isn't grid based and that the movement of the snake represents its animal counterpart movement better than ever before.  (This might be an exaggeration.)

You can control the snake with :
"a"  to rotate left
"d"  to rotate right
"w"  to boost forward

and you can open the menu by clicking the button at the top right or by simply pressing  "p" .

If you don't like the default keys then you can change the keybinds in the menu !
Thank you for playing.
